name: Nameless Anonymity
summary: Your mask protects you further from divination.
description:
Your mask protects you further from divination. Once per day, you can cast nondetection on yourself, heightened to the highest level of spell you can cast; the spell ends immediately if your mask is removed for even a moment. The spell is of the same tradition as your focus spells.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
